name: Outpost
uniques: Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [50] damage
Can be built just outside your borders
Constructing it will take over the tiles around it and assign them to your closest city

civilopediaText.text: Home to uncivilized barbarians, will spawn a hostile unit from time to time

name: Ancient ruins
uniques: Provides a random bonus when entered

name: City ruins
uniques: Will be replaced by automated workers

civilopediaText.text: A bleak reminder of the destruction wreaked by War

name: City center
uniques: Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+2 Food, +1 Production]

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization
